name: umpire
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who is present at a sports competition in order to make certain that the rules of that particular game are obeyed and to judge if particular actions are acceptable: a cricket/tennis umpire The umpire overruled the linesman and ordered the point to be replayed. Compare
arbitrator
judge noun (DECIDE)
referee noun (JUDGE)
More examplesFewer examplesMajor League Baseball does not allow umpires to review calls.We have all been brought up to accept the umpire's decision.The introduction of replay has helped the umpires in getting some of the most important calls.
